verses.name: Luke 5:21
verses.text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason, saying, Who is this which speaketh blasphemies? Who can forgive sins, but God alone?

verses.name: Luke 5:22
verses.text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts, he answering said unto them, What reason ye in your hearts?

verses.name: Luke 5:23
verses.text: Whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Rise up and walk?

verses.name: Luke 5:24
verses.text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins, (he said unto the sick of the palsy,) I say unto thee, Arise, and take up thy couch, and go into thine house.
